item.title: Nano Labs CEO Jianping Kong Increases Holding by 480,000 Shares
item.description: On August 26th, Nano Labs Ltd (Nasdaq: NA) announced that Kong Jianping, the company's Chairman and CEO, increased his holdings by 480,000 shares of Class A common stock through open market transactions in August by using personal funds.Before this, Kong Jianping had made two stock purchases in May and September 2024. This transaction strictly adhered to the company's insider trading policy and was in full compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

item.title: On-chain Data: OKB Long-Term Holder Sells Off and Buys BGB
item.description: On August 26th, based on on-chain monitoring data from lookonchain, the address 0xEB8d9d77c6c84c47a7FAA1c8f973a546316bD1F7 recently sold 3,516 OKB tokens, which were worth approximately $658,900. This batch of tokens was purchased a year ago, achieving a profit of about $525,500 and a return on investment of approximately 394%. Subsequently, the same address bought 42,584 BGB tokens with a transaction amount of approximately $199,700.

item.title: Binance Earn has announced the final batch of the Plasma USDT locking product, with a limit of 500 million USDT.
item.description: August 26th, Binance Earn announced that the final third batch of quota for the Binance On-Chain Yields Plasma USDT lock-up product is now open for subscription. The total quota is 5 billion USDT, and the subscription will commence at 2025-08-26 11:00 (UTC).Before this, after the initial launch of the Plasma USDT lock-up product and the opening of the second batch of quota, due to the enthusiastic response to the subscription, both batches were fully subscribed within minutes. To ensure the sustainability and fairness of the entire subscription pool, please be aware of the following:The subscription limit for each user in the final third batch has been reduced to 10,000 USDT. Binance may gradually adjust the quota based on market demand and other factors. Users who subscribed in previous batches will not be affected. After this third batch, no new batches will be opened, and the total subscription quota will not be increased.

item.title: Bitwise Submits Bitwise Chainlink ETF Filing
item.description: On August 26th, according to market information, Bitwise submitted the S-1 application document for the Bitwise Chainlink ETF to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

item.title: Bybit will list the Camp Network (CAMP) spot trading pair
item.description: On August 26th, Bybit is going to list the Camp Network (CAMP) for spot trading.

item.title: A certain HYPE whale went 15x long on 51,600 ETH, currently at a unrealized loss of $10 million
item.description: On August 26th, based on on-chain data, a particular HYPE whale took a long position in 51,600 ETH with a leverage of 15 times. Currently, it is facing an unrealized loss of $10 million. Their entry price was $4,630.49, and the liquidation price is $4,076.1.During the past 24 hours, this address sold 542,000 HYPE tokens (approximately $23.8 million) to go long on ETH.

item.title: 「WallStreetBros」's total unrealized loss on 5 long positions exceeds $5.8 million, with only the HYPE long position in profit.
item.description: On August 26th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng currently holds 5 long positions. The total unrealized loss is more than $5.8 million. These positions include:ETH: The position size is approximately $100.22 million, and the current unrealized loss is approximately $5.23 million.BTC: The position size is approximately $28.63 million, and the unrealized loss is approximately $69,660.HYPE: The position size is approximately $7.25 million, and the unrealized gain is approximately $12,700.YZY: The position size is approximately $600,000, and the unrealized loss is approximately $1,500.PUMP: The position size is approximately $554,000, and the unrealized loss is approximately $800.

item.title: Ethereum Reserve Concept Stocks Surge in Pre-market Trading, ETHZ Up by 4.07%
item.description: On August 26th, Ethereum reserve concept stocks generally rose in pre-market trading on the US stock market. These included:· SharpLink Gaming (SBET.US), which rose by 1.10%;· Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR.US), with a rise of 1.92%;· ETHZilla (ETHZ.US), increasing by 4.07%;· BTCS (BTCS.US), rising by 0.93%;· COIN (Coinbase.US), with a gain of 0.57%;· Bit Digital (BTBT.US), up by 0.36%.

item.title: Boros Increases Market Cap and Raises Leverage Ratio
item.description: On August 26, as per an official announcement, Boros announced a modification to the transaction parameters. The open limit in the ETH market has been raised from $40 million to $50 million, and the treasury size has been increased from $160,000 to $200,000.Meanwhile, the maximum leverage ratio for the BTC and ETH markets has been boosted from 1.9 times to 3 times. The maintenance margin ratio has also been adjusted from the previous 50% of the initial margin to 66.7%.The announcement stated that this adjustment is intended to enhance capital efficiency while strengthening risk management. As of three weeks after its launch, the Boros platform has attained a $47 million open interest contract size, with a total notional trading volume of $287 million.

item.title: CoinGecko Data: Gate's July Derivatives Trading Volume Surges 44% Month-over-Month, Holding Steady in Global Top Three
item.description: August 26th. According to the most recent assessment by CoinGecko, Gate has solidly positioned itself among the top three cryptocurrency exchanges globally. This is mainly attributed to the growth in derivatives liquidity and the continuous inflow of institutional funds. In July 2025, Gate witnessed a substantial 44% increase in derivatives trading volume, reaching $763.2 billion, which propelled the platform to the second place in terms of global market share. The exchange platform currently serves more than 36 million users in over 150 countries worldwide, demonstrating its rapid momentum of international expansion.Analysts note that Gate's expanding ecosystem is a key factor driving its growth. It covers spot and derivatives trading, institutional lending, Web3 integration, and Gate Pay's fiat-crypto integration services. At the same time, the platform maintains reserves exceeding $12.02 billion, with a total reserve ratio of 123.98%. This showcases its leading transparency throug
